content_en:
ЁЯСС
Independent Emperor

Veera Ballala II completely freed the Hoysalas from the subordination of the Chalukyas and assumed the title 'Dakshina Chakravarti' (Emperor of the South). He secured his northern borders by defeating the Yadavas.

ЁЯЫбя╕П
Protector of the Cholas

When the Pandyas invaded the Chola empire, Ballala II aided the Chola king Kulottunga III and saved the Chola kingdom, for which he was called 'Chola Rajya Pratishthapanacharya'. The Kannada poet Janna was in his court.
